languages.text: "Почему бы тебе не опередить своих врагов и не собрать из этих Блаженных рать? Раз они покорны и прилежны, то и службу будут нести неплохо. Приставь к каждому взводу верного тебе командира — и эти странные люди будут под присмотром, превратившись из угрозы в защиту".

"Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Почему бы тебе не опередить своих врагов и не собрать из этих Блаженных рать? Раз они покорны и прилежны, то и службу будут нести неплохо. Приставь к каждому взводу верного тебе командира — и эти странные люди будут под присмотром, превратившись из угрозы в защиту".

traits.locale_text: "Why don't you get the first move and assemble mighty troops out of those Blessed? Assign a loyal commander to each platoon,and these strange people will serve you as well as any devout Imperial."
"Why don't you get the first move and assemble mighty troops out of those Blessed? Assign a loyal commander to each platoon,and these strange people will serve you as well as any devout Imperial."

"Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

"Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into mighty defenders of the Imperium."

Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into mighty defenders of the Imperium."

Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

"Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

languages.text: “不如由你来抢占先机，将那些受召者整合成强大的军队吧？既然他们这么听话，这么勤奋，那他们可以成为优秀的军人。给每支小队指派一名忠诚的指挥官来引导他们，这样一来，这群怪人就可以从隐藏的威胁变成帝国的捍卫者。”
languages.original_text: "Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “不如由你来抢占先机，将那些受召者整合成强大的军队吧？既然他们这么听话，这么勤奋，那他们可以成为优秀的军人。给每支小队指派一名忠诚的指挥官来引导他们，这样一来，这群怪人就可以从隐藏的威胁变成帝国的捍卫者。”
“不如由你来抢占先机，将那些受召者整合成强大的军队吧？既然他们这么听话，这么勤奋，那他们可以成为优秀的军人。给每支小队指派一名忠诚的指挥官来引导他们，这样一来，这群怪人就可以从隐藏的威胁变成帝国强大的捍卫者。”

languages.text: «¿Por qué no da el primer paso y forma un escuadrón poderoso con estos Tocados? Si son tan obedientes y diligentes, serán buenos soldados. Asigne un comandante leal a cada escuadrón para que los vigile y esta gente extraña pasará de ser una amenaza a defensores del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no da el primer paso y forma un escuadrón poderoso con estos Tocados? Si son tan obedientes y diligentes, serán buenos soldados. Asigne un comandante leal a cada escuadrón para que los vigile y esta gente extraña pasará de ser una amenaza a defensores del Imperium».

languages.text: 「先手を打って、触れられし者たちから強大な軍隊を編成するのはどうでしょう？彼らが従順で勤勉であれば、優れた軍隊となるでしょう。各分隊に忠実な司令官を配置し、彼らを監視することで、これらの見慣れぬ者たちは脅威の存在から、帝国の護衛隊へと変貌を遂げるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「先手を打って、触れられし者たちから強大な軍隊を編成するのはどうでしょう？彼らが従順で勤勉であれば、優れた軍隊となるでしょう。各分隊に忠実な司令官を配置し、彼らを監視することで、これらの見慣れぬ者たちは脅威の存在から、帝国の強力な護衛隊へと変貌を遂げるでしょう」
「先手を打って、触れられし者たちから強大な軍隊を編成するのはどうでしょう？彼らが従順で勤勉であれば、優れた軍隊となるでしょう。各分隊に忠実な司令官を配置し、彼らを監視することで、これらの見慣れぬ者たちは脅威の存在から、帝国の強力な護衛隊へと変貌を遂げるでしょう」

languages.text: « Pourquoi ne pas prendre l'initiative et rassembler ces Altérés en une force redoutable ? S'ils sont aussi obéissants et appliqués qu'on le prétend, ils feront de parfaits soldats. Attribuez à chaque escouade un commandant loyal pour les surveiller, et ce peuple étrange passera du statut de menace à celui d'atout pour l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ne pas prendre l'initiative et rassembler ces Altérés en une force redoutable ? S'ils sont aussi obéissants et appliqués qu'on le prétend, ils feront de parfaits soldats. Attribuez à chaque escouade un commandant loyal pour les surveiller, et ce peuple étrange passera du statut de menace à celui d'atout pour l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Warum macht Ihr nicht den ersten Schritt und bildet eine mächtige Armee aus diesen Berührten? Wenn sie gehorsam und pflichtbewusst sind, geben sie erstklassige Soldaten ab. Weist jedem Trupp einen treuen Kommandanten zu, der sie im Auge behält, dann sind diese merkwürdigen Leute keine Gefahr mehr, sondern Verteidiger des Imperiums."
languages.original_text: "Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Warum macht Ihr nicht den ersten Schritt und bildet eine mächtige Armee aus diesen Berührten? Wenn sie gehorsam und pflichtbewusst sind, geben sie erstklassige Soldaten ab. Weist jedem Trupp einen treuen Kommandanten zu, der sie im Auge behält, dann sind diese merkwürdigen Leute keine Gefahr mehr, sondern Verteidiger des Imperiums."

"Macht Ihr Euch doch den ersten Schritt und versammelt eine mächtige Armee aus diesen Berührten. Wenn sie gehorsam und pflichtbewusst sind, geben sie erstklassige Soldaten ab. Weist jedem Trupp einen treuen Kommandanten zu, der sie im Auge behält, dann sind diese merkwürdigen Leute keine Gefahr mehr, sondern mächtige Verteidiger des Imperiums."

languages.text: "Neden ilk adımı biz atıp Mütehassislerden kudretli bir kuvvet kurmuyoruz? O kadar itaatkâr ve çalışkanlarsa onlardan harika bir askerî birlik olur. Her bir mangaya onlara göz kulak olacak sadık bir komutan atansın ve bu tuhaf insanlar, tehdit ögelerinden İmparatorluk'un savunucularına dönüşsünler."
languages.original_text: "Why don't you make the first move and assemble a mighty force from these Touched ones? If they are so obedient and diligent, then they will make fine troops. Assign a loyal commander to each squad to keep an eye on them, and these strange people will turn from a threat into defenders of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Neden ilk adımı biz atıp Mütehassislerden kudretli bir kuvvet kurmuyoruz? O kadar itaatkâr ve çalışkanlarsa onlardan harika bir askerî birlik olur. Her bir mangaya onlara göz kulak olacak sadık bir komutan atansın ve bu tuhaf insanlar, tehdit ögelerinden İmparatorluk'un savunucularına dönüşsünler."
